creatures.name: Thunderbird
creatures.notes: Native American bird of lightning and thunder.

creatures.name: Dragon
creatures.notes: Reptile, often with wings and capacity to breathe fire, ice, or other materials.

creatures.name: Griffin
creatures.notes: Creature with eagle head and lion body.

creatures.name: Chimera
creatures.notes: Hybrid creature, usually with lion, ram, and snake heads.

creatures.name: Gargoyle
creatures.notes: Gothic creature that can turn into a stone statue.

creatures.name: Manticore
creatures.notes: Hybrid creature, usually with human or lion head, wings, and scorpion tail.

creatures.name: Sphinx
creatures.notes: Egyptian cat creature, usually with wings.
